about_the_game:
Follow the wacky adventures of Tyson, Carol, and Edwina, three dinosaur friends who crash-land on strange world and encounter an evil cat army. Team up with a cast of unusual characters who make up the local resistance and help them take down the cats once and for all.


  • Enlist quirky characters with unique abilities and fighting styles
  • Command your team in battle while managing multiple battlefields simultaneously
  • Realize your spiritual potential by unlocking game-changing powers
  • Scout out the mysterious land and make choices
  • Learn more about the local conflict and get to know each member of your ragtag team


Dum Dum Dinos is set in Mogelis, a fantasy world occupied by an opposing (and semi-competent) cat army. Although most of the cat army is made up of unqualified grunts clinging to the impossible dream of obtaining a lucrative job with benefits, there are also some skilled fighters among their ranks who will stop at nothing to fulfill their duty and take over the land. However, these cats aren't the only ones with a bachelor's degree in kicking butt - the local resistance won't give up their land so easily.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 and above
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2560 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

name: Dum Dum Dinos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS
  • Storage: 2560 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

oflc.descriptors: Parental Guidance, Australian Classification Board (ACB), Australia

short_description: Dum Dum Dinos is a wacky strategy and narrative adventure about three dinosaurs trapped in a land controlled by a cat army hell-bent on taking over the world.
